Name: George
description:
George, as seen in the photo with his wife, has applied for a loan of 2,000,000 UGX to pay school fees for his children and with surplus to buy mulch for his plantation for increased yields, to match the increased competition.

He believes this business is profit-oriented, hence he will be able to fend for his family after the harvest and sale. He appreciates the lenders for this opportunity.
